scripts.targets:build: dirs=("chrome" "firefox"); for d in "${dirs[@]}"; do (rsync -a --delete --mkpath build/ targets/$d/ && bun manifest:build $d > targets/$d/manifest.json); done
scripts.build: bun scripts:build && bun assets:build && bun pug:build && bun targets:build
scripts.postbuild: dirs=("chrome"); for d in "${dirs[@]}"; do (cd "targets/$d" && rm js/content.js); done
scripts.package: version=$(jq -r '.version' ./package.json) dirs=("chrome" "firefox"); for d in "${dirs[@]}"; do (cd "targets/$d" && zip -r $d-$version.zip manifest.json js popup.html css images); done
